Item.sqlserver_body:
/* Name: select_wbs_element_rollup_status created: 4-dec-2005 George J. Carrette Note: this only needs to go down one level because of the context in which it is called. */ create function innovator.select_wbs_element_rollup_status(@ID CHAR(32)) RETURNS VARCHAR(64) AS begin DECLARE @SUBSTATUS_ALL TABLE(STATUS VARCHAR(64) COLLATE database_default) DECLARE @SUBSTATUS TABLE(STATUS VARCHAR(64) COLLATE database_default PRIMARY KEY) DECLARE @LIST_ID CHAR(32) DECLARE @MAX_IND INTEGER DECLARE @COLOR VARCHAR(64)
INSERT @SUBSTATUS_ALL SELECT ROLLUP_STATUS FROM WBS_ELEMENT WHERE ID IN (SELECT RELATED_ID FROM SUB_WBS WHERE SOURCE_ID = @ID) AND ROLLUP_STATUS IS NOT NULL INSERT @SUBSTATUS_ALL SELECT STATUS FROM ACTIVITY2 WHERE ID IN (SELECT RELATED_ID FROM WBS_ACTIVITY2 WHERE SOURCE_ID = @ID) AND STATUS IS NOT NULL INSERT @SUBSTATUS SELECT DISTINCT STATUS FROM @SUBSTATUS_ALL
SET @LIST_ID = (SELECT ID FROM [LIST] WHERE NAME = 'PM_StatusColor')
SET @MAX_IND = (SELECT MAX(SORT_ORDER) FROM [VALUE] WHERE SOURCE_ID = @LIST_ID AND VALUE IN (SELECT STATUS FROM @SUBSTATUS))
SET @COLOR = (SELECT VALUE FROM VALUE WHERE SOURCE_ID = @LIST_ID AND SORT_ORDER = @MAX_IND) RETURN @COLOR end
Item.name: select_wbs_element_rollup_status
